'''''Jadeite Redolence''''' is the [[Chenyu Vale]] [[soundtrack]] album.

It features two discs with a total of 54 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team, each one an original compositions for Chenyu Vale and storylines released in [[Version 4.4]], such as from [[A Thousand Moonlit Miles]] and [[Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze]].

The album was first announced on March 1, 2024, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 4.5]]. The tracklist was announced on March 25, 2024 and the album was released on March 27, 2024.<ref>Sina Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/O6CzF5Fc6 {{zh|「《原神》沉玉谷主题OST即将上线 」}}]</ref>
